\sloppy
\definecolor{lightgray}{gray}{0.5}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\begin{document}

    
    \begin{verbatim}
function fwd = spot2fwd(r,T)

t=linspace(1,T,T)'; % time every year
fwd =-log( ( 1+r(1:end-1) ).^(t(1:end-1) ) ./ ( 1+r(2:end) ).^(t(2:end)) ); %forward rates
fwd=[ -log( (1+r(1))^(-1) ); fwd];

end
\end{verbatim}



\end{document}
